items.sentence: Tom has secretly been in love with Mary for years.
Tom has to meet Mary in the park tomorrow at 2:30.
Tom has two brothers. Both of them live in Boston.
Would you like to have dinner at my place tonight?
Would you like to have tea with us this afternoon?
Would you mind if I poured myself a cup of coffee?
You can get a car license after you turn eighteen.
You can make your dream come true by working hard.
You catch more flies with honey than with vinegar.
I want you to take care of Tom for a little while.
